layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x80
  RenderBlock {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x80
    RenderBody {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x48
      RenderBlock {P} at (0,0) size 784x16
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 166x16
          text run at (0,0) width 166: "This line should be green."
      RenderBlock {P} at (0,32) size 784x16
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 61x16
          text run at (0,0) width 61: "This line "
        RenderInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 102x16
          RenderText {#text} at (60,0) size 102x16
            text run at (60,0) width 102: "should be green"
        RenderText {#text} at (161,0) size 30x16
          text run at (161,0) width 30: " too."
